name: Roasted Raspberry Chipotle Grilled Cheese Sandwich on Sourdough
author: bd.weld
summary: Smoky and sweet with a hint of heat to add a twist to a classic grilled cheese sandwich with roasted raspberry chipotle sauce.
directions: Place a skillet over medium heat
Butter 4 slices of bread with a tablespoon of butter each
Place 2 slices butter side down onto skillet
Place 2 slices of cheese on each
Spread 2 tablespoons of the roasted raspberry chipotle sauce onto each sandwich, and top each with 2 more slices of cheese
Top each with remaining bread, butter side up
Grill until bottom is lightly browned; flip sandwiches over
Grill other side until browned and cheese has melted
